name: Hearts Picture for Anime
description:
Get early access to build and test build, be able to try all epochs and test them by yourself on Patreon or contact me for support on Discord

To support me you can buy me a coffe or commission me at https://ko-fi.com/antonioriolo

I realixed this model to make heart eyes for anime, but somehow the training didn't work as expected, instead it just generates hearts everywhere and doesn't touch the eyes.

I decided to pubblish it anyway because i like the effect.

It doesn't work with all prompts and with all checkpoints, you need to be lucky, you might try to start with prompts from posted images.

Enjoy!

If you'd like to support my efforts and have access to early and bleeding edge builds, please think about joining my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/betterCuteAsians
